name: Lucardia (Early prototype)
description:
A prototype I hastily put together for the Metroidvania Month 12 game jam, the game is very early in development but I hope you enjoy the simple demo I put together :). Current story is just a placeholder.

Controls:

Left/Right - Move

R - Restart Game

A - Jump

Enter - Start Key

Known issue, game does not retain save in the browser version after closing out of the page, however the demo is short feel free to leave feedback. Dying from the spikes in the first room breaks the game, forgot to remove whoops!
